summary: Provides internal helper utilities for the Conan package manager to automatically configure package metadata (such as language detection, shared/fPIC options, and header‑only package IDs) and to invoke the lifecycle methods (source, build, configure, package) of a Conan recipe, handling output, errors, and requirement processing.
business_intent: Enable automated, consistent handling of Conan recipe steps and package identification to streamline package creation, reduce manual configuration, and ensure reliable execution of build pipelines within the Conan ecosystem.
